feed.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [GLOBAL][HostedPrivateCloud] - FreeBSD
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Nov 20, 08:30 - 10:30 UTC

Nov 18, 13:04 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our FreeBSD offer.

Start time : 20/11/2024 08:30 UTC
End time : 20/11/2024 10:30 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will do a maintenance operation on our network equipment related to FreeBSD products to maintain consistency.

entry.title: [CA][Hosted Private Cloud] - VMware Private Cloud maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Nov 20, 07:00 - 11:00 UTC

Nov 12, 21:43 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our VMware Private Cloud offer.

This may temporarily affect delivery.

Start time : 20/11/2024 07:00 UTC
End time : 20/11/2024 11:00 UTC
Service impact : No instance deployment or addition of options will be carried out, in case of host failure, spare delivery can be delayed during the maintenance period.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, our technical team will be performing maintenance on the core infrastructure configuration related to instance delivery services.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [CA/EU][Backup as a Service] - Veeam Enterprise maintenance notification
entry.content:
Nov 19, 07:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Nov 15, 15:14 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Veeam Enterprise offer.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 19/11/2024 07:00 UTC
End time : 20/11/2024 15:00 UTC
Service impact : During the maintenance, Veeam Enterprise service will be unavailable and customers won't be able to perform any new requests (registrations, updates, remove,...) from their backup servers to OVH Veeam enterprise manager.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we need to upgrade Veeam Enterprise servers to the latest version.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [Global][Hosted Private Cloud] - VMware vCenter Server maintenance notification
entry.content:
Nov 18, 08:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Nov 5, 22:46 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

Start time : 18/11/2024 08:00 UTC
End time : 22/11/2024 16:00 UTC
Service impact : Management will be temporarily unavailable for 1h30 during the maintenance.
And all hosts will be put in maintenance mode.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade for hosts and vCenter Server services.
An individual communication will be sent before the upgrade begins.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [RBX8][Hosted Private Cloud] - Rack R820L23
entry.content:
Nov 15, 19:44 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 15/11/2024 19:15 UTC
End Time : 15/11/2024 19:30 UTC
Service impact : Some hosts in rack R820L23 were temporarily unavailable.
Root cause : An electrical issue caused the incident
We would like to inform you that the incident have been resolved and the situation is back to normal.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident
